title: Revolutionizing lignin photovalorization: recent advances in TiO2-based materials and beyond in pursuit of optimal solutions for a sustainable future
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00299G, Review Article
Sabiha Sultana, Karolina Syrek, Grzegorz D. Sulka
An overview of heterogeneous photocatalytic lignin conversion to value-added feedstock; cutting-edge research for a sustainable future.
